revision.text:
'''Sinnoh''' is the fourth [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 107 Pokémon from Turtwig to Arceus. '''Sinnoh''' is the fourth [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 107 Pokémon from Turtwig to Arceus. '''Sinnoh''' is the fourth [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 107 Pokémon from Turtwig to Arceus. '''Sinnoh''' is the fourth [[Regions|Region]] in the Pokéclicker world. The Pokédex for this region contains 107 Pokémon from Turtwig to Arceus.
